channel.title: Wordpress on Tyler Harms
channel.description: Recent content in Wordpress on Tyler Harms

item.title: New Site Theme
item.author: tyler.harms@gmail.com (Tyler Harms)
item.description: I have been working on getting a new site theme up and running for a while now. My hold up was that I could never commit to a platform. I knew that I wanted off Wordpress and onto something more developer friendly. Originally I was going to put this site on eZ Publish, but that just seemed like overkill. Next I thought about creating a Symfony2 blog, but I wanted to cheapen my hosting options so I opted against Symfony2.
